label: 本朝新修往生傳
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
見出し読み: ほんちょうしんしゅうおうじょうでん
見出し読み_mod: ほんちょうしんしゅうおうじょうでん
説明文: Collection of stories of the lives of individuals who were believed to have gained birth in the Pure Land, compiled from 1131 to 1151 by 藤原宗友 Fujiwara no Munetomo.
